org.dyn4j.collision.manifold

Class Manifold

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.collision.manifold.Manifold

  • public class Manifold
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a collision Manifold.

    A Manifold has a list of ManifoldPoints for a given penetration normal.

    All ManifoldPoints are in world space.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    3.0.2
    Author:
    William Bittle
